title: Mick and the moon
brief_description: A biography of Mick Numierie Jabaljari, an Aboriginal painter. Deals with the beliefs of the Central Australian Aboriginals concerning the moon, sun and the wind. Commentary by David Gulpilil and Tony Barry.
description: A biography of Mick Numierie Jabaljari, an Aboriginal painter. Deals with the beliefs of the Central Australian Aboriginals concerning the moon, sun and the wind. Commentary by David Gulpilil and Tony Barry.
